snippet: A television critic’s swag collection includes one red woman’s shoe, with a dangerous looking stiletto heel, sent to publicize “Deadly Sins” and “Scorned: Love Kills,” the Investigation Discovery channel’s true-crime programs.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger Critic's Notebook describes collection of swag that he has amassed as a result of television networks sending him promotional materials related to their shows.
lead_paragraph: A television critic’s swag collection includes one red woman’s shoe, with a dangerous looking stiletto heel, sent to publicize “Deadly Sins” and “Scorned: Love Kills,” the Investigation Discovery channel’s true-crime programs.

headline.seo: A Television Critic’s Strange Swag Collection
headline.main: A Sack of Skivvies, a Sexy Shoe and Me
headline.print_headline: A Sack of Skivvies, a Sexy Shoe and Me
